official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the eligibility of certain minors for burial in national cemeteries.

summary.text: Defines "minor child," for purposes of determining the eligibility of a minor for burial in a national cemetery, as a child under 21 years of age, or under 23 years of age if pursuing a program of education at an educational institution.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the eligibility of certain minors for burial in national cemeteries.
